item.title: crash [ bm_c1a3a ] HELP me :(
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
I’d be rather worried about the state of my PC than about not being able to play the game really TBH in case I would had been getting loading times like yours while seeing that there are next to none people in the entire world having the same issue. I hate to give this last resort type of advice but you could try:
a) reinstalling Windows (as a method to get rid of malware/e.t.c. and to have latest drivers installed);
b) try getting another HDD and GFX card and check if that helps remedy the issue;

These are not the real ways to handle the problem but the alternative is to bring your PC to a servicing company for a paid support service.

Read full topic

its just getting worse and worse …
